synopsis.text: The Shinsengumi, an elite samurai group tasked with keeping the peace in Kyoto, face multiple crises on the eve of the Shogun's visit. First, imposters posing as Shinsengumi attack merchants, tarnishing their reputation. Meanwhile, bloodthirsty monsters called Rasetsu escape confinement. When Chizuru Yukimura, who has been assisting the Shinsengumi, goes missing along with their treasurer after an attack, tensions escalate. Suspicions arise that political rivals may be orchestrating the chaos to enact an assassination plot against the Shogun. With scandals brewing and time running out, the Shinsengumi race to solve the mystery, locate their missing comrades, and protect the Shogun at all costs. This suspenseful anime promises political intrigue, supernatural creatures, and thrilling samurai action as the Shinsengumi confront threats from all sides. Will they emerge victorious and save the day?
synopsis.author: anthropic.claude-v2:1
